message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $15,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial for you, even at this price.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I can't go below $13,000. This is already a very competitive price for a product of this quality.

I appreciate your response, Alice. While I understand your position, I'm unable to meet your price of $13,000. I would like to propose $11,000 as a potential compromise. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
